Description: Controls whether or not sparklines are displayed.
Controls whether or not Ad Hoc trending is available.
Controls whether or not the Dashboard is available.
Controls whether or not the Watchlist is available.
Controls whether or not users can create new Profiles.
Controls whether or not Groups are available.
Controls whether or not KPIs are available.
Controls whether or not Trends are available.
Controls whether or not Pareto Charts are available.
Controls whether or not XY Plots are available.
Controls whether or not Bar Charts are available.
Controls whether or not Pie Charts are available.
Controls whether or not Gantt Charts are available.
Controls whether or not Embedded Content is available.
Controls whether or not Trend Comments are available (also requires Windows authentication to be enabled on the Web server).
Controls whether or not Tables are available.
Controls whether or not search is available.
Controls whether or not Geo Maps are available (Note: Requires setting Enable Outbound Requests to TRUE).
Controls whether or not the Near Me feature is available (Note: Setting this feature to TRUE will have some impact on cache time).
Controls whether or not KPI Maps are available.
Controls whether or not Group Maps are available.
Controls whether or not KPI Status History is stored (Note: Setting this feature to TRUE will have some impact on cache time and will cause your database to grow, depending on your history duration).
Controls whether or KPI Status Summary is available (Note: This feature requires KPI Status History Storage to be turned ON).
Controls whether or KPI Status History is available (Note: This feature requires KPI Status History Storage to be turned ON).
Controls whether or not KPI Notification History is available (Note: This feature requires KPI Status History Storage to be turned ON).
Controls whether or not Trends of KPIs can show Status history in the background (Note: This feature requires KPI Status History Storage to be turned ON).
Controls whether or not Group Trends are available.
Controls whether or not KPI bullet charts are available.
Controls whether or not Status History charts are available.
Controls whether or not Site Roll-Ups (KPI Roll-Ups from other Visual KPI sites) are available.
Determines whether or not access to KPIs, Charts and Tables is based on Windows Security Groups (Note: Setting this feature to TRUE will have some impact on cache time).
